data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Norðurland vestra prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Norðurland vestra, Iceland
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Norðurland vestra, Iceland to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 22 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Norðurland vestra, Iceland.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Norðurland vestra, Iceland.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the South Asian, general people.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Norðurland vestra, Iceland.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Norðurland vestra against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.section_summary:
the state of Norðurland vestra, Iceland has a population of 7,400.

We estimate Norðurland vestra has 329 people who might know Jesus, 6,352 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 719 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Norðurland vestra to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
